translations: n.（统治者的）配偶；一组（古乐器或乐师）；随航船只；伙伴
v.厮混，（别人反对的）结交；陪伴；符合

sentences.sentence: Consort has a population of 714 and is about as rural and isolated as you can get.
sentences.translation: 康索特有居民714人，地处农村，极其偏远。

sentences.sentence: She is the consort of Shiva.
Once turn to practice, error and truth will no longer consort together.
sentences.translation: 一旦经过实践，真理和谬误就不再相互陪伴。
